title: Best hikes in Madeira — insider tips
description: From Pico do Arieiro to Levada walks: what’s actually worth it

body.raw:
# Best hikes in Madeira

<Callout variant="warning">Always check weather and closures before you go (some PR trails can be closed).</Callout>

More soon…
